mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Deposit_account (std_id, tch_id, deposit_id, rate, deposit_amount, start_date, end_date, status) VALUES (#{stdId}, #{tchId}, #{depositId}, #{rate}, #{depositAmount}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 'Y');
mapper.select: select a.*, d.deposit_period from deposit_account a join deposit d on a.deposit_id = d.deposit_id where end_date <= NOW() and status = 'Y' order by account_id
select a.*, d.deposit_period from deposit_account a join deposit d on a.deposit_id = d.deposit_id where end_date <= NOW() and status = 'Y' order by account_id limit #{_pagesize} offset #{_skiprows}
select a.*, d.deposit_period from deposit_account a join deposit d on a.deposit_id = d.deposit_id where end_date <= NOW() and status = 'Y' limit 1
